history.proof: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rmax_right,Rmult_le_compat_l,Rmax_left. hfcrush use: Rmult_le_reg_l, Rmult_comm, Rmult_0_r unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rmax_left (Rmax _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmax_left (Rmax _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H1 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c n : a * b <= a * c -> False Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = right n Unable to unify "a * b" with "a * c".

In environment H1 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c n : a * b <= a * c -> False Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = right n Unable to unify "?M2853 * ?M2854 < ?M2853 * ?M2855 \\/ ?M2853 * ?M2854 = ?M2853 * ?M2855" with "a * c = a * b".

In environment H2 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c n : a * b <= a * c -> False Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = right n Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "a * c = a * b".

In environment H3 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H1 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c n : a * b <= a * c -> False Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = right n Unable to unify "?M3569 * ?M3570 < ?M3569 * ?M3571 \\/ ?M3569 * ?M3570 = ?M3569 * ?M3571" with "a * c = a * b".

In environment H2 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H0 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a r : b <= c n : a * b <= a * c -> False Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = right n Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "a * c = a * b".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of Rmax_right (Rmax _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmax_right (Rmax _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H5 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H4 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 H3 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a n : b <= c -> False r : a * b <= a * c Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = left r Unable to unify "a * c" with "a * b".

In environment H5 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H4 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 H3 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a n : b <= c -> False r : a * b <= a * c Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = left r Unable to unify "?M5353 * ?M5354 < ?M5353 * ?M5355 \\/ ?M5353 * ?M5354 = ?M5353 * ?M5355" with "a * b = a * c".

In environment H2 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H1 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 H0 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a n : b <= c -> False r : a * b <= a * c Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = left r Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "a * b = a * c".

In environment H5 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H4 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 H3 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a n : b <= c -> False r : a * b <= a * c Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = left r Unable to unify "?M6213 * ?M6214 < ?M6213 * ?M6215 \\/ ?M6213 * ?M6214 = ?M6213 * ?M6215" with "a * b = a * c".

In environment H2 : forall x y : R, y <= x -> Rmax x y = x H1 : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2 H0 : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmax x y = y a, b, c : R H : 0 <= a n : b <= c -> False r : a * b <= a * c Heqs : Rle_dec (a * b) (a * c) = left r Unable to unify "0 <= a" with "a * b = a * c".

original: intros a b c H. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - rewrite Rmax_left. + rewrite Rmax_left. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. - rewrite Rmax_right. + rewrite Rmax_right. * reflexivity. * apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H. + apply Rmult_le_compat_l. apply H.
